channel.title: mac on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in mac on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Openshot Video Editor
item.description: Ever since my Dad brought home an Apple IIe back in 1980, I’ve been a huge Apple fan. The design of my website back in the mid 90’s was a ripoff of the Mac OS 9 System menu. (I found a later version on the Wayback Machine. I had swapped out the Apple icon for the icon of the startup I was working with at the time.) I loved OS X for a while, especially on my 12” Aluminum powerbook.
